Instruction: Preheat the oven to 400°F and lightly grease a baking sheet.
Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a large bowl. Incorporate shortening until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Add 2 cups of buttermilk, stirring just until the dough comes together.

Shape dough into biscuits, making each biscuit 1 inch thick. Cut out rounds using a biscuit cutter and place them on the prepared baking sheet. Brush the tops of the biscuits with 2 tablespoons of buttermilk.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 20-25 minutes.
